mapper.select: select a.center_id, b.branchname AS center_name, a.line_id, a.qy, a.autoprint_typeid as auto_print_type_id, a.f_del, a.ins_date, a.ins_time, a.ins_user_id, a.ins_func_id, a.ins_ope_id, a.upd_date, a.upd_time, a.upd_user_id, a.upd_func_id, a.upd_ope_id from centralkitchen.mt_various_auto_print a left join centralkitchen.branches b on a.center_id = b.branchcd and b.isclosed = 0 where a.qy != 0 and a.qy is not null and a.f_del = 0 and a.center_id = #{centerId} and a.autoprint_typeid = #{autoPrintTypeId}
